name.ja: <ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>壊<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>壁<rt>へき</rt></ruby><ruby>礫<rt>れき</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher Wyrm Type monster on your field.

effect.en: Negate the attack. This turn, your opponent cannot attack with Level 7 or lower monsters.
